mapper.sql: id, user_name, account, password, permission, phone, register_time, last_online_time
mapper.update:
UPDATE login_user
user_name = #{do.userName},
account = #{do.account},
password = #{do.password},
phone = #{do.phone},
permission = #{do.permission},
register_time = #{do.registerTime},
last_online_time = #{do.lastOnlineTime},
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_name, account, password, phone, permission, register_time, last_online_time FROM login_user WHERE account = #{account}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM login_user
AND phone = #{phone}
